name: Catstages Tower of Tracks Cat Toy – 3-Level Track Tower with 6 Balls, Interactive Cat Toy for Indoor Enrichment
short_description: Ball Cat Toy: Multi-level cat toy with 3 tiers and 6 spinning balls—keeps indoor cats active, curious, and entertained
Enrichment: Encourages batting, swatting, and chasing to satisfy natural hunting instincts and boost everyday enrichment
Durable & Safe: Sturdy, non-slip base and a secure safety bar for hours of independent, worry-free play
Feline Favorite: Designed for older kittens and adult cats alike; great for multi-cat homes or gifting; not recommended for kittens under 12 weeks
Expandable: Enjoy on its own or pair with Catstages Topper Toys (sold separately) for even more interactive chaos
product_description: Keep your kitty active, entertained, and mentally engaged with the Catstages Tower of Tracks — the ultimate interactive cat toy designed to delight cats of all ages and activity levels. This three-level cat track toy features six brightly colored balls that spin, roll, and race through the circular tracks, encouraging endless swatting, batting, and chasing. Whether your cat is playing solo or enjoying friendly competition with a furry sibling, this indoor cat toy provides the perfect outlet for natural hunting instincts and energetic play. Built for safety and stability, the Tower of Tracks features a non-slip base and durable plastic construction that holds up to daily use—even in multi-cat households. Unlike single-level toys, this multi-tier cat ball track adds visual and physical stimulation, making it an excellent cat enrichment toy that helps prevent boredom, reduce stress, and support healthy exercise indoors. Perfect for kittens, adult cats, and senior cats alike, this engaging cat toy is designed to keep curious paws busy and minds sharp. Whether your cat prefers solo playtime or likes to show off their pouncing skills, the Tower of Tracks is a fun, low-maintenance toy that satisfies their need for physical activity and mental stimulation. Give your feline friend a toy they’ll love to return to with the Catstages Tower of Tracks—a top-rated choice for indoor cats who crave challenge, motion, and excitement. WARNING:For cats only. Not recommended for kittens under 12 weeks of age. Keep out of reach of children. Contains small parts. When choosing a toy, make sure to choose the appropriate size for your cat. No toy is indestructible. Ultimately, your pet's safety is your responsibility. ALWAYS supervise your cat when using a toy of any kind. Inspect toys regularly for damage and remove if broken, or if parts become separated, as serious injury may result.
